availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Matthew R. Waller (Union County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Morganfield, Union County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Aaron Waller and Mary Waller. Married to Martha C. Parker Waller in Union County on November 23, 1858. Father of George Waller. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Household owned twenty-two enslaved persons in Union County in 1850. Merchant in Union County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860. Merchant in Union County in 1863.

ab.bibl:

Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Union County, KY, July 1863, p. 54.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film 000562203.
